title: What do you think of BTS and Jason Derulo’s Savage Love remix? - Quora

response.answer_text: I really liked it! The two mashed versions of the song sounded amazing! Jungkook’s voice really for the song, and I enjoyed it. I hope to see more like this!
The song is amazing. Twitter is loving how cute JK is cursing. The tune is catchy, lyrics seem to have substance and matches the music well. The song is awesome, no complaints.
